presets.name: Customers
presets.businessContext: Customer data import for managing customer information including contact details, company affiliations, account types, and registration information.

keyDefinitions.keyDescription: Unique identifier for the customer (e.g., C-001, C-002)
Complete name of the customer contact person
Primary email address for customer communication
Contact phone number in various formats
Name of the company or organization the customer represents
Customer account tier (Basic, Standard, Premium, Enterprise)
Current status of the customer account (Active, Inactive, Pending)
Date when the customer registered or was onboarded
Primary business location or city of the customer

presets.name: Cash Receipts
presets.businessContext: Financial transaction data import for cash receipt processing.

keyDefinitions.keyDescription: Unique number for the transaction record
Reference number for the associated bank deposit
Sequential receipt number for the cash receipt
Bank institution code (e.g., BONZ, BOA, BOT, BOJ)
Category of the payor: Client, Vendor, Employee, or Misc
Unique identifier for the payor entity
Transaction amount in decimal format (e.g., 123.45)
Date when the transaction was last modified (various date formats supported)

presets.name: Deposits
presets.businessContext: Bank deposit data import for tracking deposit transactions across multiple banks, including source codes, employee assignments, and deposit totals.

keyDefinitions.keyDescription: Sequential unique identifier for each deposit transaction
Origin of the deposit: AR (Accounts Receivable), MA (Manual), or TR (Transfer)
Date when the deposit was created (supports DD/MM/YYYY format)
Total deposit amount in decimal format (e.g., 123.45, 26342.12)
Banking institution identifier (e.g., BOT, BONZ, BOA, BOJ)
Employee identifier who processed or is responsible for the deposit
